EmailTemplate.description: This email will be sent when an assigned GDC Tech Case needs to be Opened
EmailTemplate.name: GDC New Case Needs Opening
EmailTemplate.subject: GDC Tech Case Needs to be Opened
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
{!Case.Priority} priority case, {!Case.Case_Number__c}, has been assigned to {!Case.OwnerFullName} but has not been opened yet. Please open the case and add notes regarding possible cause and estimated fix date.
Please click below to go to the Case detail page: {!Case.Link}
Thank you,
Honeywell Global Data Center Web: http://www.Mygdc.com
